item.title: GPT2 From Scratch For Dummies!
item.description: GPT-2 Implementation From Scratch For Dummies! If you ever had trouble understanding the code behind the attention and the research paper’s complex code, this is for you. In this post, I break down the inner workings of a GPT-2 modelâ€”from token embeddings and positional encodings to multi-head self-attention and MLP blocks. I’ll try to “dumb” things down and explain the details and intution behind the each line of the code as much as I can, if you’re a dummy like me, I hope this helps.
